title: on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972)
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Marine
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Marine 

Equipment) (Amendment) Regulations 2021.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited european union (marine equipment) (amendment) regulation 2021

title: on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972)
heading: In these Regulations “Principal Regulations” means the European
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations “Principal Regulations” means the European 

Union (Marine Equipment) Regulations 2017 (S.I. No. 177 of 2017).
text_norm: 2 regulation principal regulation mean european union (marine equipment) regulation 2017 (s.i no 177 2017)

title: on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972)
heading: 3. Regulation 2 of the Principal Regulations is amended in paragraph
text_raw:
3. Regulation 2 of the Principal Regulations is amended in paragraph 

(1)— 

(a) by the substitution for the definition of the “Directive” of the 

following: 
“‘Directive’ means Directive 2014/90/EU of 23 July 20141, as 
amended by Commission Delegated Directive (EU) 2021/1206 
of 30 April 20212;”, and 

(b) by the deletion of the definitions of the “Regulation of 2019” 

and “Regulation of 2020”.
text_norm: 3 regulation 2 principal regulation amended paragraph (1)-- (a) substitution definition directive following directive mean directive 2014 90 eu 23 july 20141 amended commission delegated directive (eu) 2021 1206 30 april 20212 (b) deletion definition regulation 2019 regulation 2020

title: on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972)
heading: 4. Regulation 10 of the Principal Regulations is amended in paragraph
text_raw:
4. Regulation 10 of the Principal Regulations is amended in paragraph 
(2)(b) by the substitution of “Commission Implementing Regulation (EU) 
2021/1158 of 22 June 20213” for “Regulation of 2020”. 

1 OJ No. L 257, 28.8.2014, p. 146 
2 OJ No. L 261, 22.7.2021, p. 45 
3 OJ No. L 254, 16.7.2021, p. 1 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 30th November, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [625] 3

title: on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972)
heading: 5. Regulation 46 of the Principal Regulations is amended by the deletion
text_raw:
5. Regulation 46 of the Principal Regulations is amended by the deletion 

of paragraphs (3) to (6). 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

25 November, 2021. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for Transport. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [625]
text_norm: 5 regulation 46 principal regulation amended deletion paragraph (3) (6) given official seal 25 november 2021 eamon ryan minister transport 4 625

title: on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972)
heading: (This note is not part of the legal instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the legal instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

This Statutory Instrument amends the European Union (Marine Equipment) 
Regulations 2017 ( S.I. No. 177 of 2017 ), which gave effect to Directive 
2014/90/EU of 23 July 2014, to take account of Commission Delegated 
Directive (EU) 2021/1206 of 30 April 2021 amending Annex III to Directive 
2014/90/EU and Commission Implementing Regulation (EU) 2021/1158 of 22 
June 2021.. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [625] 5
